name: Quantumnauts: Chapter 1 - Speed of Light, Space Pirates and Multiverses
name_original: Quantumnauts: Chapter 1 - Speed of Light, Space Pirates and Multiverses
description:
Quantumnauts: Chapter 1 - Speed of Light, Space Pirates and Multiverses is an adventure game developed by Midian Design. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Midian Design.
You can play Quantumnauts: Chapter 1 - Speed of Light, Space Pirates and Multiverses on PC.
